title: Slightly rounded italic font
author: jamiegrind

comments.content: This is probably **[Lato (Black Italic)](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317115519/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Google-Web-Fonts&ffam=Lato%20-%20Black%20Italic&fid=6c522f09efc8b83271666585f9fc6bf0&fsize=60&text=webflow&wrap=2)** by Lukasz Dziedzic (part of Google Web Fonts) modified to be more round.
